function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public's ignorance of self-protection","Impact":"Exasperated negative impacts of the outbreak, broadening the outbreak scope","Mitigation":"Increase transparency in information disclosure and prioritize public health education","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, social media platforms for dissemination","People":"Public, government, academic community","Owner":"Government, health organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Politics being the most important issue restricting the voice of the academic community","Impact":"Harms the public's right to know","Mitigation":"Promote academic freedom and independence from political influence","Technologies":"Policy reforms, independent academic platforms","People":"Academic community, government","Owner":"Academic institutions, policy makers"},{"Description":"Inability to establish networks of working relationships among individuals, groups, and agencies","Impact":"Barriers to effective risk communication and coordination","Mitigation":"Promote collaboration and establish communication channels","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication tools","People":"Government agencies, organizations, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, organizations, public health authorities"}]}
